6. “ For Christ, when we were yet without strength, in his own time died for the ungodly.'' We have next the proof of the love of God, thus shed forth and superabounding, from its effect in giving up to death for us our Lord J esus Christ in whom he loves us, and in whom we are reconciled. This death the apostle here variously amplifies.
